fields.label: Purpose
fields.description: Supports health and safety of pregnant and breastfeeding employees, ensures accommodations, and promotes a respectful workplace.

fields.label: Scope
fields.description: Applies to all female employees who are pregnant or breastfeeding.

fields.label: Health and Safety Considerations
options: No hazardous work for pregnant/breastfeeding employees
Alternate duties offered if current work is unsafe
Risks assessed and mitigated by employer

fields.label: Non-Discrimination
options: No dismissal or penalty for pregnancy/breastfeeding

fields.label: Breastfeeding Support
options: Reasonable breaks for breastfeeding or expressing milk
Private space provided for up to 6 months post-birth

fields.label: Maternity Leave
options: 4 months unpaid maternity leave (1 month before, 3 after birth)
Company assists in claiming UIF benefits

fields.label: Review and Improvement
fields.description: Policy reviewed regularly and improved based on employee feedback and legal updates.
